trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SEQ_00<tab>The face of an injured Sekiseigumi blade is twisted in pain.
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_TODO_01<tab>Use the milky white salve on the injured Sekiseigumi blade.
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_000<tab>Ugh... <pant> I must...get word to my brother. But these wounds... I cannot.
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_001<tab>You... You don't look to be one of them. I take great risk trusting you, but I've no other choice. Nor the time. Please, hear me out.

TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_002<tab>I am a blade of the Sekiseigumi, and I <wince> came under attack by a foreign devil while on patrol. I fear my fellow blade may meet with the same fate if not warned.
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_003<tab>I... I will survive. <grunt> But my Sekiseigumi brother must be told of this attack. He patrols an alley off Kogane Dori. Please, go with haste.
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_004<tab>I... I will survive. <grunt> But my Sekiseigumi brother must be told of this attack. He patrols an alley off Kogane Dori. Please, go with haste.

TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIB02814_000_011<tab>My brother blade? Attacked by a foreign devil? And one so skilled as to injure one of the Sekiseigumi's most gifted... Rushing after this fiend on my own would be rushing to my own death.

TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIB02814_000_012<tab>I would ask your help in this. Use this milky white salve on the injured Sekiseigumi blade that sent you to me. For my part, I will send for reinforcements from the barracks.
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_020<tab>Did you see word to my brother blade?
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_021<tab>He sent you back with this salve? <groan> Thank you. And thank the gods he is safe.
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_022<tab>Worry not. My pain is mostly gone. My apologies for pulling you into this. But I see now I was right to trust you.
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_023<tab>As I told you, my attackers hail from across the seas. Violence is forbidden in Kugane, but those from abroad have little love for our laws.

TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_024<tab>My brother blade and I broke up their illicit dealings some time ago. No doubt they did not take kindly to that. My guess is they gathered their gil and hired an assassin.

TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_025<tab>Little did they know, we Sekiseigumi are not so easily killed. I hazard my brethren blades have already hunted these scoundrels down and gaoled them by now.
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_026<tab>You did us a service this day. As one who wears the haori of the Sekiseigumi, on behalf of us all, I thank you.
